basic.description: This course explores the methods and strategies for teaching independent travel techniques to learners with visual impairments. The course presents and discusses methods, strategies, and information related to the teaching of independent travel skills. Emphasis is on travel within indoor environments.
basic.subject: EVI
basic.title: Applied Methods of Orientation and Mobility

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EVI 4121, EVI 4220, and EVI 4314 or EVI 5316.
